name: BaziGarMusicX
description: Open-Source bot to play songs in your Telegram's Group Voice Chat. Powered by PyTgCalls.

SUDO_USERS.description: List of user IDs counted as admin everywhere (separated by space).

DURATION_LIMIT.description: Max audio duration limit for downloads (minutes).

GROUP_SUPPORT.description: if you have group fill the group username here without @

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: if you have channel fill the channel username here without @

ASSISTANT_NAME.description: fill with the assistant username without @

BG_IMAGE.description: fill with your costum background image link

OWNER_ID.description: fill with your telegram id as the owner of the bot

DATABASE_URL.description: fill with the mongodb url you get from cloud.mongodb.com

LOG_CHANNEL.description: create a private channel and get the channel id, add your bot as admin to the channel too
